name: Pose & Animate characters - Figma native rigged characters
description:
The idea of rigging and using the power of figma's components, came out of the need to pose and produce many artworks of people, for the app in the shortest possible time.


Please share with your fellow UI designer ;) and Feel free to remix them and adapt into your own style.

Contact me if you have any questions or issues.


Thanks.

ibnfahmi5004@gmail.com
